message_1: What is the key used to encrypt the message "KHOOR ZRUOG" using a Caesar Cipher with a shift of 3?
message_2:
To decrypt the message "KHOOR ZRUOG" encrypted using a Caesar Cipher with a shift of 3, you need to shift the letters back by 3 positions in the alphabet.

K -> H -> I -> J
H -> E -> F -> G
O -> L -> M -> N
O -> L -> M -> N
R -> O -> P -> Q
Z -> W -> X -> Y
R -> O -> P -> Q
U -> R -> S -> T
O -> L -> M -> N
G -> D -> E -> F

The decrypted message is "HELLO WORLD". The key used to encrypt this message was a Caesar Cipher with a shift of 3.
